20110102190711.000|20110102190713.000|CC1|>> I THINK YOU'RE GOING TO SEE

20110102190720.000|20110102190722.000|CC1|THIS BUSINESS?

20110102190722.000|20110102190724.000|CC1|PARKING STRUCTURES.             
20110102190724.000|20110102190727.000|CC1|>> THE REVENUE FOR THE PARKING

20110102191552.000|20110102191556.000|CC1|CHANGE IT FOR ALL THE           
20110102191556.000|20110102191557.000|CC1|DEPARTMENTS.                    
20110102191557.000|20110102191600.000|CC1|WHO DO WE HOLD ACCOUNTABLE?     
20110102191600.000|20110102191602.000|CC1|THE MAYOR, HOLD THE MAYOR       
20110102191602.000|20110102191603.000|CC1|RESPONSIBLE, ACCOUNTSABLE.      
20110102191603.000|20110102191604.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY THE CHARTER WAS      
20110102191604.000|20110102191606.000|CC1|DESIGNED, TO HOLD THAT PERSON   
20110102191606.000|20110102191608.000|CC1|RESPONSIBLE.                    
20110102191608.000|20110102191612.000|CC1|>> THE ONLY DIFFERENCE IS THAT  
20110102191612.000|20110102191613.000|CC1|RATE PAYER PAYS THE BILL TO THE 
20110102191613.000|20110102191615.000|CC1|DEPARTMENT OF WATER AND POWER.  
20110102191615.000|20110102191616.000|CC1|WE DON'T PAY A BILL TO THE      
20110102191616.000|20110102191620.000|CC1|HARDWARE DEPARTMENT OR THE LOS  
20110102191620.000|20110102191621.000|CC1|ANGELES AIRPORT.                
20110102191621.000|20110102191622.000|CC1|SO IT AFFECTS OUR POCKETBOOKS   
20110102191622.000|20110102191624.000|CC1|IN THE MOST DIRECT WAY AND SOME 
20110102191624.000|20110102191626.000|CC1|OF US SHARED THE OPINION THAT   
20110102191626.000|20110102191627.000|CC1|THAT'S SOMETHING THAT WE SHOULD 
20110102191627.000|20110102191629.000|CC1|DEAL WITH NOW AND NOT WAIT.     
20110102191629.000|20110102191635.000|CC1|>> BUT THE MAYOR HAS PUT A      
20110102191635.000|20110102191636.000|CC1|NOMINEE AS THE NEW GENERAL      
20110102191636.000|20110102191637.000|CC1|MANAGER.                        
20110102191637.000|20110102191638.000|CC1|YOU'LL BE LOOKING AT HIM FOR    
20110102191638.000|20110102191638.000|CC1|CONFIRMATION.                   
20110102191638.000|20110102191639.000|CC1|>> THAT'S CORRECT.              
20110102191639.000|20110102191641.000|CC1|>> WE COULD EITHER ACCEPT THAT  
20110102191641.000|20110102191642.000|CC1|OR REJECT THAT.

20110102192533.000|20110102192536.000|CC1|AS IT IS NOW, WE CAN BRING IN   
20110102192536.000|20110102192537.000|CC1|46,000 PEOPLE WITH THE VENUES

20110102192540.000|20110102192540.000|CC1|UP ANOTHER 65,000.
